body.name: Chef Knife - 8 Inch Pro Kitchen Chef Knife High Carbon Stainless Steel Sharp Chef's Knife with Ergonomic Handle and Gift Box - Chef's Knives for Family & Restaurant Use
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Multi-functional Chef's Knife】- BYkooc chef's knife can be used in homes and restaurants. For ingredients such as meat, vegetables, and bread in the kitchen, it can perfectly perform chopping, slicing, dicing, shredding and more.

【Sharp Knife】- Sharp chef's knife with a thickness of 2.5 millimeters is made of high carbon stainless steel, which has excellent rust resistance, hardness, and durability, and can maintain its function for a long time.

【Ergonomic Handle】-The wooden handle of the chef's knife adopts an ergonomic design, providing a balanced and comfortable grip experience during the use of the knife.The finely polished handle and triple rivets brings a more sturdy structure to the knife handle.
【High Efficiency】- A suitable chef's knife can improve your cooking efficiency and help you quickly complete cooking tasks. Save more time to taste and share delicious food with loved ones.

【Festive Gift】- The 8 inch chef knife is packaged in a high-quality gift box and is an exquisite gift. A gift for Father's Day, Mother's Day, New Year, birthday, weekend party, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas and other important festivals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BYkooc 8 inch chef's knife is made of high carbon stainless steel, which has sharpness, rust resistance and durability.The sharp blade makes it easy for chefs to cut meat, vegetables, and other tasks.

Perfect Choice of Gift The 8 inch chef knife is packaged in a high-quality gift box. A gift for Father's Day, Mother's Day, New Year, birthday, weekend party, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas and other important festivals.
Invest in this chef's knife to add high-quality and long-lasting functionality to your kitchen! Thickness of blades is 2.9 mmUltra-sharp edgeStrong and DurableMulti-functionalErgonomic handle

Please Note: After using, please remember to rinse to maintain sharpness for a long time.Our chef knives are dishwasher safe, but frequent washing in the dishwasher tends to reduce their lifetime.The blade of chef knife is very sharp, please do not test it with your fingers and keep it out of reach of children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: absolutely thrilled with this chef knife! The high carbon stainless steel is incredibly sharp and holds its edge well. The ergonomic handle is comfortable to hold and the balance is spot on. I've used it for chopping, slicing, and dicing and it performs flawlessly. The gift box is a nice touch, making it a great gift for any home cook or professional chef. I'm impressed with the quality and value for the price. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable and sharp chef knife!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, durable chef knife
reviews.reviewText: I was pretty pleased with this chef knife as I needed a new one anyways. My only concern is that its not super sharp when you receive it. I was able to cut into chicken breast but after that it was pretty dull. The knife has some weight to it which makes it feel super durable and sturdy. I have sharpened it and since then it has cut through a lot! I have cut through chicken leg quarter bones, frozen meat and veggies. Overall it is a decent chef knife, just not super sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit and Finish Somewhat Off
reviews.reviewText: The knife is value-priced and this lessens a lot of my minor quibbling about it. So what are the quibbles? Well, there are lots of small flaws, like little scratches all along the blade, as if the maker didn't take the time to polish it well at the factory. Along the choil (the top part of the knife which does not make contact with food), there are some minor chips and at the middle where the choil meets the handle there is an off-centered pin hole. Also, the blade arrived dull, dull, dull. It could not chop through an apple without a lot of force applied - though to be fair, the knife's somewhat thick and the geometry works against it in use cases like this. I spent about 10 minutes with my whetstone and it got a lot better.I liked the balance point of the knife and as I said the price is very appealing. With some work, the knife is a good tool for actual use. It is not one of those beautiful, expensive pieces that people collect. That said, if you're not prepared to sharpen the knife yourself do not bother. This Bykooc chef knife is rather poor-performing out of the box.Would I recommend it? Well....perhaps not. There are lots of knives on Amazon that are finished better around the $10-$15 range. This was a fun impulse purchase. Let's leave it at that.
